Body:
I have to send My iot data to Oracle IoT cloud service. As i Found there client Library here

But wanted to know that if they have some sdk to do so? And also how to start with this client library
By SDK you mean an npm package?
yes.I think its easy to implement by npm.

You can connect to the clound via MQTT service and this is very similar to the code example provided at MQTT tutorial. refer to section Arduino MQTT programming in this page.

You may also use Node-Red to connect to DB or push data via MQTT (ofcourse only if your IoT data is channeled through a device that has sufficient RAM/CPU to support Node-red (eg: Orange Pi
